pullRequest.title: Override definingClassFromCPFieldRef for JITServer
pullRequest.bodyText:
definingClassFromCPFieldRef is a newly introduced frontend method that
needs to be overridden at the server for correct functionality.
Fixes: #8605
Signed-off-by: Marius Pirvu mpirvu@ca.ibm.com

commit.message:
Override definingClassFromCPFieldRef for JITServer

definingClassFromCPFieldRef is a newly introduced frontend method that
needs to be overridden at the server for correct functionality.

Fixes: #8605

Signed-off-by: Marius Pirvu <mpirvu@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Is there an optimization opportunity here for isStatic == false? It seems like we can call the parent class method and avoid the network.
